**Add event creation & editing (forms + endpoints)**

Description
-----------
Allow users with appropriate roles to create and edit events with full metadata: title, description, category, event date, subscription window, responsible person, campus/location, communication link.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Backend endpoints to create/update/delete events.
- Server-side validation for required fields and dates.
- Frontend forms for event creation and editing (can be server-rendered pages or SPA forms).

Labels: backend, frontend, feature
Estimate: medium
